p: Sequences obtained were aligned in BioEdit Sequence Alignment Editor Version 7.2.6 using CLUSTAL W [ 28] and compared with reference sequences of all known HIV-1 group M subtypes (A1, A2, B, C, D, F1, F2, G, H, J, and K). Circulating recombinant forms (CRFs) were downloaded from the Los Alamos HIV sequence database ( www.hiv-web.lanl.gov). The Phylogenetic tree was constructed using the MEGA version 7 software package with a bootstrap robustness of 1,000 replicates ( http://megasoftware.net). Sequences with <70% homology were confirmed using the softwares RDP (Recombinant Detection Programme) and SplitsTree 4 version 4.14.4.
